attributes.action: Leaders of the main parties must take part in 3 televised 2017 election debates
attributes.background: A snap election shouldn't dilute the democratic process: the electorate must know where leaders stand on key issues prior to voting and what they are voting for. A huge portion of the electorate don't have access to the internet or funds to buy papers, for some, TV is the only information source.

rejection.details: This petition calls on party leaders, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
